description: My cheat's version of Chicken and Corn Soup.
name: Chicken & Sweet Corn Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cooked bbq chook, all meat taken off the bone and sliced
125g can super sweet corn kernels, drained
5 sprigs italian parsley leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan, saut√© the diced brown onion and crushed garlic on a medium heat in butter and oil until translucent, stirring occasionally, so not to catch on the bottom of the saucepan.
Add 800 ml of liquid chicken stock, sliced BBQ chicken meat, creamed corn and corn kernels to the saucepan and bring to a slow simmer.

With the remaining 200ml of chicken stock, place in a large microwave safe container and heat on high in the microwave in 30 second intervals, until hot.Cut the cream cheese into small pieces and add to the microwave container with the hot stock and mix until the cream cheese has melted and become a creamy stock mixture.
Add the creamy stock mixture to the chicken and corn soup in the large saucepan and bring to a slow simmer.
Add the sliced spring onions, chopped parsley, salt and pepper to taste and serve with warm crusty bread.
